key.name: open-at-first-doc
key.description: If TRUE the file browser plugin will view the directory of the first opened document given that the file browser hasn't been used yet. (Thus this generally applies to opening a document from the command line or opening it with Caja, etc.)

key.name: filter-mode
key.description: This value determines what files get filtered from the file browser. Valid values are: none (filter nothing), hidden (filter hidden files), binary (filter binary files) and hidden_and_binary (filter both hidden and binary files).

key.name: filter-pattern
key.description: The filter pattern to filter the file browser with. This filter works on top of the filter_mode.

key.name: terminal-command
key.description: The terminal command when using the "Open terminal here" command.

key.name: tree-view
key.description: Open the tree view when the file browser plugin gets loaded instead of the bookmarks view

key.name: root
key.description: The file browser root directory to use when loading the file browser plugin and onload/tree_view is TRUE.

key.name: virtual-root
key.description: The file browser virtual root directory to use when loading the file browser plugin when onload/tree_view is TRUE. The virtual root must always be below the actual root.

key.name: enable-remote
key.description: Sets whether to enable restoring of remote locations.
